snippet.title: Divine Divinity Steam Launch Trailer (HD)
snippet.description:
Now available on STEAM!

Divine Divinity - Larian Studios:
http://www.larian.com/Site/english/divinity/divinity.html

Divine Divinity - GameSpot.com:
http://uk.gamespot.com/divine-divinity/

Divine Divinity - GOG.com:
http://www.gog.com/gamecard/divine_divinity

Divine Divinity - PC - IGN:
http://uk.ign.com/games/divine-divinity/pc-14562

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Listed among "The Top 100 PC Games Of All Time" by PC GAMER (2012), Divine Divinity is an epic role-playing game with hack-and-slash action, offering a huge world to explore and thousands of items to investigate, trade and use - and is now available on Steam, for the first time ever!

http://store.steampowered.com/app/214170

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Game Information:

Developer(s):
Larian Studios

Publisher(s):
CDV
Snowball Studios

Version:
1.34
1.4 (Remastered version)

Platform(s):
Microsoft Windows

Release date(s):
2002

Genre(s):
Role-playing video game

Mode(s):
Single-player

Rating(s):
ESRB: T

Media/distribution:
CD
DVD
download

System requirements:
Pentium II 450 MHz with 128 MB of RAM
8 MB of VRAM
a 4x speed CD-ROM drive
a 100% DirectSound compatible soundcard and 2.5 GB free HDD space
OS: Windows 95/98/ME/2000/XP

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

GamersHellTV News:

- Larian's cult classic RPG re-launched -

Released 10 years ago, Divine Divinity is now available via Steam offering support for Windows 7 and higher resolutions, Larian Studios announced. Divine Divinity chronicles the never-ending battle between valiant heroes and the destructive powers of Chaos harnessed by the Black Ring, a cult of enduring evil. You play the role of the prophesied Chosen One who, under the guidance of the wizard Zandalor, must unite the seven races of Rivellon so that you may become the Divine One and stop the birth of the Lord of Chaos.
